Since the narrator is "john shrapnel" and also "gerry troyna", there are no cells with different values.
- For row 6: episode no=6, episode title="journey to the land beyond the mountains", uk broadcast date="1983 - 03 - 22", narrator="ray gosling", writer="ray gosling", details of journey="duouro valley (including the corgo line )", countries visited="portugal". Since the narrator is "ray gosling" and also "ray gosling", there are no cells with different values.

Since the narrator is "stanley reynolds" and also "stanley reynolds", there are no cells with different values.
